name: Ah Goo
summary: It's a home-style Taiwanese restaurant that's decent.  My favorite thing there is the green onion bing, which is a carb-bomb but worth it.

name: Bistro Na
summary: Great ambiance and delicious Chinese food don't often go together. I guess that's why this place is so expensive. This is the place I like to take fancy out-of-town guests for Chinese food.

name: Mariscos el Faro
summary: It's a taco truck parked in Highland Park that has a great aguachile.  It also has a seabass (lobino) tostada which isn't easy to find in LA.
